title: Huddle landing page with alternating feature blocks
text: This project was built in pure HTML and CSS. I had mobile and desktop designs to work with and built it, so that it was fully responsive. I used modern CSS, like Flexbox and Grid for layout purposes and I took a mobile-first approach.

title: Dine Restaurant
text: This project required from me to build a fully responsive multi page website to the designs provided. I used React, a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. React Router for page navigation and Vanilla CSS to style pages of the project.

title: Scoot multipage website
text: This project was a challenge for me. I solved it by using the JavaScript library React, for building user interfaces and for page routing I used React Router library. Animations for this project were done with the help of Framer Motion. And for styling I used styled components.

title: Designo multi-page website
text: This project was the most complex one I have done so far. It consists of a frontend part, built with React framework Next.js. Styling for the project has been done with the help of CSS Modules and to give it a smooth page transition I used Framer Motion.

title: Audiophile e-commerce website
text: This project was the most complex one I have done so far. It consists of a frontend part, built with React framework Next.js. Styling for the project has been done with the help of CSS Modules and to give it a smooth page transition I used Framer Motion. For data management I used the useContext hook.
